about_the_game:
Year 1 Pass!

This pass unlocks all the DLC that we will release during hexceed's first year! We will be releasing a new DLC every month, each containing a new world to complete. That's 12 new worlds to explore! Over 1000 levels to complete! Over 300,000 individual hexes to uncover!

Contents

Although each DLC will be available for purchase individually, this year 1 pass will shave 25% off the total price.
Here is a breakdown of the DLCs included, as well as when we intend to introduce some new mechanics to the game:
  • 1 - Stella (Jan 2021)
  • 2 - Animo (Feb 2021) + new mechanic - Rotating Tiles!
  • 3 - Iter (Mar 2021)
  • 4 - Clavis (Apr 2021)
  • 5 - Cessabit (May 2021) + new mechanic - Big Tiles!
  • 6 - Inventa (Jun 2021)
  • 7 - Exsupero (Jul 2021) + new mechanic! - Ranged Triangle!
  • 8 - Progressum (Aug 2021)
  • 9 - Illumina (Sep 2021) + new mechanic! - Switching Tiles!
  • 10 - Casus (Oct 2021)
  • 11 - Effugium (Nov 2021) + new mechanic! - Ring!
  • 12 - Rimor (Dec 2021)
detailed_description:
Year 1 Pass!

This pass unlocks all the DLC that we will release during hexceed's first year! We will be releasing a new DLC every month, each containing a new world to complete. That's 12 new worlds to explore! Over 1000 levels to complete! Over 300,000 individual hexes to uncover!

Contents

Although each DLC will be available for purchase individually, this year 1 pass will shave 25% off the total price.
Here is a breakdown of the DLCs included, as well as when we intend to introduce some new mechanics to the game:
  • 1 - Stella (Jan 2021)
  • 2 - Animo (Feb 2021) + new mechanic - Rotating Tiles!
  • 3 - Iter (Mar 2021)
  • 4 - Clavis (Apr 2021)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: hexceed - Year 1 Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This is your pass to 12 exciting new worlds to complete in hexceed! With 1000+ levels to complete, 300,000+ hexes to clear, and 5 more puzzle mechanics to discover!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
